Container.Name: xteve_zap
Container.Overview:
xteve proxy for iptv
included functions are (all can be individual turned on / off)
xteve - iptv and epg proxy server for plex, emby, etc ... thanks to @marmei website: http://xteve.de Discord: https://discordapp.com/channels/465222357754314767/465222357754314773
zap2it support with multiply logins
guide2go - xmltv epg grabber for schedules direct, thanks to @marmei github: https://github.com/mar-mei/guide2go Schedules Direct web: http://www.schedulesdirect.org/
after docker start check your config folder and do your setups, setup is persistent, start from scratch by delete them
to test the cronjob functions docker exec -it "dockername" ./config/cronjob.sh
some small script lines cause i personally use tvheadend and get playlist for xteve and cp xml data to tvheadend
